original_text: You know these true proverbs: ‘After a dog has been sick, it returns to eat it again.’ Also: ‘After you wash a pig, it will quickly roll in the dirt again.’ These words describe how the false teachers live.
korean_text: 참된 속담에 이르기를 개가 그 토하였던 것에 돌아가고 돼지가 씻었다가 더러운 구덩이에 도로 누웠다 하는 말이 그들에게 응하였도다

sentences.original_text: After a dog has been sick,
it returns to eat it again.
it will quickly roll in the dirt again.
These words describe how the false teachers live.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 말들은 거짓 교사들이 어떻게 사는지를 묘사한다.
